thread.section_title: 1000Bulbs.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 1000Bulbs.com | www.1000bulbs.com | 5 of 1344
thread.title: Maurice McClain

author: Maurice McClain
title: Maurice McClain
text: Selecting and choosing the correct bulbs, especially LED bulbs can be daunting, even for the most proficient egg-heads. This site has made it easy for just about anyone who wants to move up (and they should for the energy and thus cost savings) to LED technology. You can't go wrong with this group to provide you with the best bulbs at a fair price... lower than the local big boxes!
